verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Oh Lord, I'm hungry and I want to be fed.
Oh Lord, I'm hungry and I want to be fed.
Oh Lord, I'm hungry and I want to be fed.
Feed me all the days of my life
Feed me, O Lord, feed me, O Lord,
Feed me, O Lord, feed me, O Lord,
Feed me all the days of my life.
Feed me, O Lord, feed me, O Lord,
Feed me, O Lord, feed me, O Lord,
Feed me all the days of my life.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
O Lord, I am weary and want to be led. (3x)
Lead me all the days of my life.
Lead me, O Lord, lead me, O Lord.
Lead me all the days of my life. (2x)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Oh Señor, tengo hambre y quiero comer.
Oh Señor, tengo hambre y quiero comer.
Oh Señor, tengo hambre y quiero comer.
dame lo suficiente para mí.
/Dámelo Señor, dámelo Señor
dame lo suficiente para mí/(2)
Oh Señor tengo sed y quiero beber,...
